ygData.subject: Re: Gnome quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Borxx is indeed a very very bad Evil Eye in Runnyeye.  That s all I can tell you b/c I have not ever been foolish enough to cross his path! hehe *-----Original
ygData.messageBody:
Borxx is indeed a very very bad Evil Eye in Runnyeye. That's all I can tell
you b/c I have not ever been foolish enough to cross his path! hehe

*-----Original Message-----
*From: Jay [mailto:jayalan@...]
*Sent: Tuesday, April 20, 1999 10:59 AM
*To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
*Subject: [eqenchanters] Gnome quest
*
*
*From: Jay <jayalan@...>
*
*Have any gome enchanters out there been given the quest to get the lens
*from 'Borxx'? It's supposed to be in Antonica somewhere, and Borxx is
*supposed to be an "Evil Eye?"
*Any hints would be appreciated (no spoilers though :) ) Thanks!
*Jalaar...Solesuk Ro Server
